name: Final Expantion
description:
Humanity has become the most advanced race in our galaxy. The Sacred Empire of the Earthlings (hereafter SEE) is expanding on all planets where there is "new" life. Our player is one of the soldiers of the SEE army, who is on the "outpost" of the captured planet, but at some point begins an uprising on this planet.

The player's task is to evacuate the planet.
